Some text

>>> from sympy import *

>>> t = symbols('t')
>>> term = Sum(t, (t, 0, oo))
>>> term
Sum(t, (t, 0, oo))

Produces

\[\sum_{t=0}^{\infty} t\]
>>> 3
3
